title: The Gary Null Show
content:
The World Health Organization’s Private Vaccine Laboratory – how intentional is the lack of safety in vaccine... <!--more--> ingredients?
With Christina England Christina England is an extremely important investigative journalist who has reached and written on the vaccine flaws, pharmaceutical and vaccine industry corruption, and the science supporting the lack of efficacy and safety of vaccines.  Her earlier career was as a care giver to the elderly and working with disabled children which earned her the Care Giver of the Year award in the UK.  Have adopted two disabled boys in 1990, it was later discovered that one of the boys, who was diagnosed as autistic, had had adverse reactions to the MMR while in foster care.  She went on to receive accreditation journalism and media and has been reporting on vaccine dangers for many years, primarily for the website VacTruth.com  She is also the co-author with Dr Harold Buttram of “Shaken Baby Syndrome or Vaccine-Induced Encephalitis.”  Her website is ParentsAndCarersAgainstInjustice.Weebly.com
